DOC.brief_summary: This study aim identify Olmsted County senior citizen risk vulnerability . Those elder screen `` affirmatively '' vulnerability offer participation pilot intervention aim keep senior independent community . This intervention consist comprehensive geriatric home visit development individualize action plan aim preservation function independence . Participants follow several month baseline assessment evaluate implementation recommendation .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Preserve Functional Status Independence Among Community Dwelling Elderly
DOC.criteria: Age 65 older Olmsted County Resident Able provide consent English speaking available translator
